department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Government of Canada is procuring a wood chipper to supply a department.
description: The Government of Canada is seeking a wood chipper to supply and deliver two self-contained, towable wood chippers.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
F7047-220044 - Wood Chipper

## Announcement Details
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3927288279
- **Purchase Description**: The Government of Canada invites Contractors to submit offers for the supply and delivery of two (2) self-contained, towable wood chippers. The wood chippers must be capable of chipping trees and brush with a diameter capacity of 14cm or greater.
- **Procurement Method**: Open to all qualified Contractors
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), allowing for participation from businesses based in Canada
- **Delivery Region**: The wood chippers must be deliverable to British Columbia, Canada
- **Contractor Selection Criteria**: Offers will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal, which seeks proposals for a contract with a specified duration
- **Contract Duration**: Expected to commence on or after the contract award, and is expected to terminate on August 31, 2024
- **Contact Information**:
    - Name: Darlene Thorne (SPAC/PSPC)
    - Email: [darlene.thorne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:darlene.thorne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
    - ICTS (Indigenous Contracting Transaction System): http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16334264?extsite=MTYzMzQyNjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
    
*Closing Date*: June 6, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time. All submissions must be received by this date.
 
Please report to Tender the following information to receive any updates on this tender announcement: [Update on Tender]
